## Purpose

The purpose of this site is to convey B-causal Lab research to a broader public. 


## Contact 

My name is Joseph Bulbulia (Joe). I am a professor of psychology at Victoria of University, and head of the B-Causal Lab.
My email address is: joseph.bulbulia@vuw.ac.nz
